doc.title: Evolution of a Warrior
doc.plot: Evolution of a Warrior See IGOR competing in many different Martial Arts like Brazilian Jiu Jitsu or Gracie Jiu Jitsu, Judo, Kickboxing, Submission Wrestling, Pankration and Vale Tudo. See this multiple black belt holder executing perfect throws, punches, locks, and chokes, on his evolution to become a Vale Tudo fighter. Techniques featured on this tape are: Flying Armlocks Armlock combinations Chokes, Leglocks, Throws Lowkicks, Sweeps, Takedowns Submissions a la IGOR Desperate opponents As one of the most technical all-round fighters IGOR is always trying to entertain the crowd with some spectacular finishes. See IGOR taking on opponents far heavier then him and witness their desperation while fighting the 70 Kg Austrian warrior. Witness IGORS wins & losses through all the belt ranks to the final victories in Vale Tudo. Enjoy this first tape of the: "From the Mat to Ultimate Fighting" Series.
